short_summary: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION (RFI) FOR BUSINESS ACCELERATOR AND INCUBATOR PERFORMANCE MEASUREMENT FRAMEWORK DATA AND ECOSYSTEM PARTNERSHIP INITIATIVE
description: To assess the capacity and availability of suppliers (including organizations, partnerships, or individuals) within Canada's business accelerator and incubator (BAI) sector to provide either, or both, ecosystem partner and data collection services required as part of the Business Accelerator and Incubator Performance Measurement Framework (BAI PMF) Data and Ecosystem Partnership Initiative.
full_summary:
================================================

### Request for Information (RFI) 

**Business Accelerator and Incubator Performance Measurement Framework Partnership Initiative**

### Reference

- **Contract Reference Number:** CB-16-3210775
- **Amendment Number:** 1

### Solicitation Details

| **Tender Details** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | ISEDRFI | ISEDRFI |
| **Publication Date** | March 5, 2024 | 5 mars 2024 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | March 20, 2024 at 14:00 | 20 mars 2024 14h00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | April 12, 2024 | 12 avril 2024 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | March 29, 2029 | 29 mars 2029 |

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada is seeking information on the capacity and availability of suppliers (organizations, partnerships, or individuals) within Canada's business accelerator and incubator sector to provide ecosystem partner and data collection services as part of the Business Accelerator and Incubator Performance Measurement Framework Data and Ecosystem Partnership Initiative.

### Solicitation Category

* **Corporate Objectives or Policy Development**
* **Data Services**
* **Economic Development Consultancy**
* **Production Statistics Collection or Analysis Services**

### Seats of Delivery

* **Ontario (except NCR)**
* **Quebec (except NCR)**

### Interested Parties

Organizations, partnerships, or individuals interested in responding to this RFI should refer to the documentation attached to this notice for further information.

### Point of Contact

* **Name:** Sophie Montminy
* **Email:** [sophie.montminy@ISED-ISDE.gc.ca](mailto:sophie.montminy@ISED-ISDE.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** 343-542-9283

### Attachments

Download the attached PDFs for a detailed overview of the RFI and for more information on this tender opportunity. The following documents are available:

* **English Version:** [Business Accelerator and Incubator Performance Measurement Framework Partnership Initiative (Trace)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33498/rfi---business-accelerator-and-incubator-performance-measurement-framework-partnership-initiative-%281.pdf.webform)
